site_name: Becket House, 60-68 St Thomas Street, London
description: Redevelopment of the site to include demolition of Becket House and the erection of a 27 storey building with additional level of plant and basement levels in order to provide office use (Class B1), retail (flexible Class A1/A3), cycle parking, servicing, incidental to the development. The application is accompanied by an Environmental Statement submitted pursuant to the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017. Application can be viewed by appointment at Southwark Council's offices, 160 Tooley Street, SE1 2QH (Mon - to Fri 9am to 5pm). Non-Technical Summary available free of charge,Copies of the full ES are available for purchase from Trium Environmental Consulting (email: hello@triumenv.co.uk or call 02038877118).
